mapper.select: select p.no, p.name, p.price, i.no as image_no, i.url as image_url, oc.name as optionChild1Name from product p, product_image i, product_detail pd, option_child oc where p.no=i.product_no and p.dp_main='Y' and p.is_sell='Y' and pd.product_no=p.no and pd.option_child1_no=oc.no order by oc.no

select p.no, p.name, p.price, i.no as image_no, i.url as image_url, oc.name as optionChild1Name from product p, product_image i, product_detail pd, option_child oc where p.no=i.product_no and p.dp_main='N' and p.is_sell='Y' and pd.product_no=p.no and pd.option_child1_no=oc.no order by oc.no
